ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (is) from Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (is) from Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayah_translit: inna anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi fa-u'budi al-laha mukh'lisan lahu al-dina
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] have revealed to you the Book in truth so worship Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

ayah: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡخَالِصُۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مَا نَعۡبُدُهُمۡ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِي مَا هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ كَٰذِبٞ كَفَّارٞ
ayah_translit: ala lillahi al-dinu al-khalisu wa-alladhina ittakhadhu min dunihi awliyaa ma na'buduhum illa liyuqarribuna ila al-lahi zul'fa inna al-laha yahkumu baynahum fi ma hum fihi yakhtalifuna inna al-laha la yahdi man huwa kadhibun kaffarun
ayah_english: Unquestionably for Allah (is) the religion the pure And those who take besides Him besides Him protectors Not we worship them except that they may bring us near to Allah (in) position Indeed Allah will judge between them in what they [in it] differ Indeed Allah (does) not guide (one) who [he] (is) a liar and a disbeliever

ayah: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡخَالِصُۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مَا نَعۡبُدُهُمۡ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِي مَا هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ كَٰذِبٞ كَفَّارٞ

ayah: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلۡخَالِصُۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مَا نَعۡبُدُهُمۡ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِي مَا هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ كَٰذِبٞ كَفَّارٞ

ayah: لَّوۡ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدٗا لَّٱصۡطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
ayah_translit: law arada al-lahu an yattakhidha waladan la-is'tafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashau sub'hanahu huwa al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
ayah_english: If Allah (had) intended Allah (had) intended to take a son surely, He (could) have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed Glory be to Him He (is) Allah the One the Irresistible

ayah_translit: law arada al-lahu an yattakhidha waladan la-is'tafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashau sub'hanahu huwa al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
ayah_english: If Allah (had) intended Allah (had) intended to take a son surely, He (could) have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed Glory be to Him He (is) Allah the One the Irresistible

ayah: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيۡلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيۡلِۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ يَجۡرِي لِأَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّـٰرُ
ayah_translit: khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi yukawwiru al-layla ala al-nahari wayukawwiru al-nahara ala al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman ala huwa al-'azizu al-ghafaru
ayah_english: He created the heavens and the earth in [the] truth He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night And He subjected the sun and the moon each running for a term specified Unquestionably He (is) the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah_translit: khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi yukawwiru al-layla ala al-nahari wayukawwiru al-nahara ala al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman ala huwa al-'azizu al-ghafaru
ayah_english: He created the heavens and the earth in [the] truth He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night And He subjected the sun and the moon each running for a term specified Unquestionably He (is) the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزۡوَٰجٖۚ يَخۡلُقُكُمۡ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡ خَلۡقٗا مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ خَلۡقٖ فِي ظُلُمَٰتٖ ثَلَٰثٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ
ayah_translit: khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma ja'ala min'ha zawjaha wa-anzala lakum mina al-an'ami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqan min ba'di khalqin fi zulumatin thalathin dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tus'rafuna
ayah_english: He created you from a soul single Then He made from it its mate And He sent down for you of the cattle eight kinds He creates you in (the) wombs (of) your mothers creation after after creation in darkness[es] three That (is) Allah your Lord for Him (is) the dominion (There is) no god except He Then how are you turning away

ayah_translit: khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma ja'ala min'ha zawjaha wa-anzala lakum mina al-an'ami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqan min ba'di khalqin fi zulumatin thalathin dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tus'rafuna

ayah_english: He created you from a soul single Then He made from it its mate And He sent down for you of the cattle eight kinds He creates you in (the) wombs (of) your mothers creation after after creation in darkness[es] three That (is) Allah your Lord for Him (is) the dominion (There is) no god except He Then how are you turning away

ayah: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزۡوَٰجٖۚ يَخۡلُقُكُمۡ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡ خَلۡقٗا مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ خَلۡقٖ فِي ظُلُمَٰتٖ ثَلَٰثٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

ayah: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزۡوَٰجٖۚ يَخۡلُقُكُمۡ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡ خَلۡقٗا مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ خَلۡقٖ فِي ظُلُمَٰتٖ ثَلَٰثٖۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ
ayah_translit: khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma ja'ala min'ha zawjaha wa-anzala lakum mina al-an'ami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqan min ba'di khalqin fi zulumatin thalathin dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tus'rafuna
ayah_english: He created you from a soul single Then He made from it its mate And He sent down for you of the cattle eight kinds He creates you in (the) wombs (of) your mothers creation after after creation in darkness[es] three That (is) Allah your Lord for Him (is) the dominion (There is) no god except He Then how are you turning away

ayah: إِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُمۡۖ وَلَا يَرۡضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَۖ وَإِن تَشۡكُرُواْ يَرۡضَهُ لَكُمۡۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: in takfuru fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun ankum wala yarda li'ibadihi al-kuf'ra wa-in tashkuru yardahu lakum wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
ayah_english: If you disbelieve then indeed Allah (is) free from need of you And not He likes in His slaves ungratefulness And if you are grateful He likes it in you And not will bear bearer of burdens (the) burden (of) another Then to your Lord (is) your return then He will inform you about what you used (to) do Indeed, He (is) the All-Knower of what (is) in the breasts of what (is) in the breasts

ayah: إِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُمۡۖ وَلَا يَرۡضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَۖ وَإِن تَشۡكُرُواْ يَرۡضَهُ لَكُمۡۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

ayah: إِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُمۡۖ وَلَا يَرۡضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَۖ وَإِن تَشۡكُرُواْ يَرۡضَهُ لَكُمۡۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

ayah: إِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُمۡۖ وَلَا يَرۡضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَۖ وَإِن تَشۡكُرُواْ يَرۡضَهُ لَكُمۡۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: in takfuru fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun ankum wala yarda li'ibadihi al-kuf'ra wa-in tashkuru yardahu lakum wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wa-idha massa al-insana durrun da'a rabbahu muniban ilayhi thumma idha khawwalahu ni'matan min'hu nasiya ma kana yad'u ilayhi min qablu waja'ala lillahi andadan liyudilla an sabilihi qul tamatta' bikuf'rika qalilan innaka min ashabi al-nari
ayah_english: And when touches [the] man adversity he calls (to) his Lord turning to Him then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself he forgets (for) what he used to call he used to call [to] Him before before and he sets up to Allah rivals to mislead from His Path Say Enjoy in your disbelief (for) a little Indeed, you (are) of (the) companions (of) the Fire

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah_english: And when touches [the] man adversity he calls (to) his Lord turning to Him then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself he forgets (for) what he used to call he used to call [to] Him before before and he sets up to Allah rivals to mislead from His Path Say Enjoy in your disbelief (for) a little Indeed, you (are) of (the) companions (of) the Fire

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ سَاجِدٗا وَقَآئِمٗا يَحۡذَرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَيَرۡجُواْ رَحۡمَةَ رَبِّهِۦۗ قُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِي ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: amman huwa qanitun anaa al-layli sajidan waqaiman yahdharu al-akhirata wayarju rahmata rabbihi qul hal yastawi alladhina ya'lamuna wa-alladhina la ya'lamuna innama yatadhakkaru ulu al-albabi
ayah_english: Is (one) who [he] (is) devoutly obedient (during) hours (of) the night prostrating and standing fearing the Hereafter and hoping (for the) Mercy (of) his Lord Say Are equal those who know and those who (do) not know Only will take heed those of understanding those of understanding

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ سَاجِدٗا وَقَآئِمٗا يَحۡذَرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَيَرۡجُواْ رَحۡمَةَ رَبِّهِۦۗ قُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِي ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

ayah: أَمَّنۡ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ سَاجِدٗا وَقَآئِمٗا يَحۡذَرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَيَرۡجُواْ رَحۡمَةَ رَبِّهِۦۗ قُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِي ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

ayah: قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۗ وَأَرۡضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجۡرَهُم بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
ayah_translit: qul ya'ibadi alladhina amanu ittaqu rabbakum lilladhina ahsanu fi hadhihi al-dun'ya hasanatun wa-ardu al-lahi wasi'atun innama yuwaffa al-sabiruna ajrahum bighayri hisabin
ayah_english: Say O My slaves [those] who believe! Fear your Lord For those who do good in this world (is) good and the earth (of) Allah (is) spacious Only will be paid back in full the patient their reward without account

ayah: قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۗ وَأَرۡضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجۡرَهُم بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
ayah_translit: qul ya'ibadi alladhina amanu ittaqu rabbakum lilladhina ahsanu fi hadhihi al-dun'ya hasanatun wa-ardu al-lahi wasi'atun innama yuwaffa al-sabiruna ajrahum bighayri hisabin

ayah: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayah_translit: qul inni umir'tu an a'buda al-laha mukh'lisan lahu al-dina
ayah_english: Say Indeed I [I] am commanded that I worship Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion

ayah_english: Say Indeed I [I] am commanded that I worship Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion

ayah: وَأُمِرۡتُ لِأَنۡ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-umir'tu li-an akuna awwala al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And I am commanded that I be (the) first (of) those who submit

ayah: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: qul inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
ayah_english: Say Indeed I [I] fear if I disobey my Lord (the) punishment (of) a Day great

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي
ayah_translit: quli al-laha a'budu mukh'lisan lahu dini
ayah_english: Say I worship Allah I worship Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) my religion

ayah: فَٱعۡبُدُواْ مَا شِئۡتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦۗ قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيهِمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡخُسۡرَانُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayah_translit: fa-u'budu ma shi'tum min dunihi qul inna al-khasirina alladhina khasiru anfusahum wa-ahlihim yawma al-qiyamati ala dhalika huwa al-khus'ranu al-mubinu
ayah_english: So worship what you will besides Him besides Him Say Indeed the losers (are) those who (will) lose themselves and their families (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection Unquestionably that it (is) the loss the clear

ayah_translit: fa-u'budu ma shi'tum min dunihi qul inna al-khasirina alladhina khasiru anfusahum wa-ahlihim yawma al-qiyamati ala dhalika huwa al-khus'ranu al-mubinu

ayah: لَهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحۡتِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
ayah_translit: lahum min fawqihim zulalun mina al-nari wamin tahtihim zulalun dhalika yukhawwifu al-lahu bihi ibadahu ya'ibadi fa-ittaquni
ayah_english: For them from above them coverings of the Fire and from below them coverings (With) that threatens Allah [with it] His slaves O My slaves! So fear Me

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَنَبُواْ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعۡبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰۚ فَبَشِّرۡ عِبَادِ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina ij'tanabu al-taghuta an ya'buduha wa-anabu ila al-lahi lahumu al-bush'ra fabashir ibadi
ayah_english: And those who avoid the false gods lest they worship them and turn to Allah for them (is) the glad tiding So give glad tidings (to) My slaves

ayah_english: And those who avoid the false gods lest they worship them and turn to Allah for them (is) the glad tiding So give glad tidings (to) My slaves

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَنَبُواْ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعۡبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰۚ فَبَشِّرۡ عِبَادِ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحۡسَنَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: alladhina yastami'una al-qawla fayattabi'una ahsanahu ulaika alladhina hadahumu al-lahu wa-ulaika hum ulu al-albabi
ayah_english: Those who they listen (to) the Word then follow the best thereof those (are) they whom Allah has guided them Allah has guided them and those are [they] the men of understanding the men of understanding

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحۡسَنَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

ayah: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: afaman haqqa alayhi kalimatu al-'adhabi afa-anta tunqidhu man fi al-nari
ayah_english: Then is (one) who became due on him the word (of) the punishment Then can you save (one) who (is) in the Fire

ayah: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ لَهُمۡ غُرَفٞ مِّن فَوۡقِهَا غُرَفٞ مَّبۡنِيَّةٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ
ayah_translit: lakini alladhina ittaqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqiha ghurafun mabniyyatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wa'da al-lahi la yukh'lifu al-lahu al-mi'ada
ayah_english: But those who fear their Lord for them (are) lofty mansions above them above them lofty mansions built high flow from beneath them the rivers (The) Promise (of) Allah Not Allah fails Allah fails (in His) promise

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَٰبِيعَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَجۡعَلُهُۥ حُطَٰمًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samai maan fasalakahu yanabi'a fi al-ardi thumma yukh'riju bihi zar'an mukh'talifan alwanuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yaj'aluhu hutaman inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah sends down from the sky water and He makes it flow (as) springs in the earth then He produces with it crops (of) different colors then they wither and you see them turn yellow then He makes them debris Indeed in that surely, (is) a reminder for those of understanding for those of understanding

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَٰبِيعَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَجۡعَلُهُۥ حُطَٰمًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samai maan fasalakahu yanabi'a fi al-ardi thumma yukh'riju bihi zar'an mukh'talifan alwanuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yaj'aluhu hutaman inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah sends down from the sky water and He makes it flow (as) springs in the earth then He produces with it crops (of) different colors then they wither and you see them turn yellow then He makes them debris Indeed in that surely, (is) a reminder for those of understanding for those of understanding

ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah sends down from the sky water and He makes it flow (as) springs in the earth then He produces with it crops (of) different colors then they wither and you see them turn yellow then He makes them debris Indeed in that surely, (is) a reminder for those of understanding for those of understanding

ayah: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدۡرَهُۥ لِلۡإِسۡلَٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡقَٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: afaman sharaha al-lahu sadrahu lil'is'lami fahuwa ala nurin min rabbihi fawaylun lil'qasiyati qulubuhum min dhik'ri al-lahi ulaika fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: So is (one for) whom Allah has expanded Allah has expanded his breast for Islam so he (is) upon a light from his Lord So woe to (those are) hardened their hearts from (the) remembrance of Allah (the) remembrance of Allah Those (are) in error clear

ayah: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ
ayah_translit: al-lahu nazzala ahsana al-hadithi kitaban mutashabihan mathaniya taqsha'irru min'hu juludu alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talinu juluduhum waqulubuhum ila dhik'ri al-lahi dhalika huda al-lahi yahdi bihi man yashau waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
ayah_english: Allah has revealed (the) best (of) [the] statement a Book (its parts) resembling each other oft-repeated Shiver from it (the) skins (of) those who fear their Lord then relax their skins and their hearts at (the) remembrance (of) Allah That (is the) guidance (of) Allah He guides with it whom He wills And whoever Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray then not for him any guide

ayah: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ
ayah_translit: al-lahu nazzala ahsana al-hadithi kitaban mutashabihan mathaniya taqsha'irru min'hu juludu alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talinu juluduhum waqulubuhum ila dhik'ri al-lahi dhalika huda al-lahi yahdi bihi man yashau waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
ayah_english: Allah has revealed (the) best (of) [the] statement a Book (its parts) resembling each other oft-repeated Shiver from it (the) skins (of) those who fear their Lord then relax their skins and their hearts at (the) remembrance (of) Allah That (is the) guidance (of) Allah He guides with it whom He wills And whoever Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray then not for him any guide

ayah: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ

ayah: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّتَشَٰبِهٗا مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ

ayah: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِي بِوَجۡهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: afaman yattaqi biwajhihi sua al-'adhabi yawma al-qiyamati waqila lilzzalimina dhuqu ma kuntum taksibuna
ayah_english: Then (is) he who will shield with his face (the) worst punishment (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection And it will be said to the wrongdoers Taste what you used (to) earn

ayah: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-atahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
ayah_english: Denied those who (were) before them (were) before them so came upon them the punishment from where not they perceive

ayah_translit: kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-atahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
ayah_english: Denied those who (were) before them (were) before them so came upon them the punishment from where not they perceive

ayah: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-adhaqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wala'adhabu al-akhirati akbaru law kanu ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So Allah made them taste So Allah made them taste the disgrace in the life (of) the world and certainly (the) punishment (of) the Hereafter (is) greater if they knew

ayah: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad darabna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And indeed We have set forth for people in this Quran of every example so that they may take heed

ayah: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: qur'anan arabiyyan ghayra dhi iwajin la'allahum yattaquna

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا رَّجُلٗا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلٗا سَلَمٗا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: daraba al-lahu mathalan rajulan fihi shurakau mutashakisuna warajulan salaman lirajulin hal yastawiyani mathalan al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Allah sets forth Allah sets forth an example a man belonging to partners quarreling and a man (belonging) exclusively to one man are they both equal (in) comparison All praise (be) to Allah Nay most of them (do) not know

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا رَّجُلٗا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلٗا سَلَمٗا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٞ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
ayah_translit: innaka mayyitun wa-innahum mayyituna

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyamati inda rabbikum takhtasimuna
ayah_english: Then indeed you (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection before your Lord will dispute

ayah: ۞فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ إِذۡ جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: faman azlamu mimman kadhaba ala al-lahi wakadhaba bil-sid'qi idh jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
ayah_english: Then who (is) more unjust than (one) who lies against Allah and denies the truth when it comes to him Is (there) not in Hell an abode for the disbelievers

ayah: ۞فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ إِذۡ جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah_english: Then who (is) more unjust than (one) who lies against Allah and denies the truth when it comes to him Is (there) not in Hell an abode for the disbelievers

ayah: ۞فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ إِذۡ جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhi jaa bil-sid'qi wasaddaqa bihi ulaika humu al-mutaquna
ayah_english: And the one who brought the truth and believed in it those [they] (are) the righteous

ayah: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: lahum ma yashauna inda rabbihim dhalika jazau al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: For them (is) what they wish with their Lord That (is the) reward (of) the good-doers

ayah: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُم بِأَحۡسَنِ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: liyukaffira al-lahu anhum aswa-a alladhi amilu wayajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsani alladhi kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: That Allah will remove That Allah will remove from them (the) worst (of) what they did and reward them their due for (the) best (of) what they used (to) do

ayah: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُم بِأَحۡسَنِ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبۡدَهُۥۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ
ayah_translit: alaysa al-lahu bikafin abdahu wayukhawwifunaka bi-alladhina min dunihi waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
ayah_english: Is not Allah sufficient (for) His slave And they threaten you with those besides Him besides Him And whoever Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray then not for him any guide

ayah: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبۡدَهُۥۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ

ayah: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبۡدَهُۥۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ

ayah_english: Is not Allah sufficient (for) His slave And they threaten you with those besides Him besides Him And whoever Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray then not for him any guide

ayah: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ
ayah_translit: waman yahdi al-lahu fama lahu min mudillin alaysa al-lahu bi'azizin dhi intiqamin
ayah_english: And whoever Allah guides Allah guides then not for him any misleader Is not Allah All-Mighty All-Able of retribution All-Able of retribution

ayah: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ

ayah_english: And whoever Allah guides Allah guides then not for him any misleader Is not Allah All-Mighty All-Able of retribution All-Able of retribution

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلۡ أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلۡ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوۡ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحۡمَةٍ هَلۡ هُنَّ مُمۡسِكَٰتُ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ قُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُۖ عَلَيۡهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna al-lahu qul afara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi in aradaniya al-lahu bidurrin hal hunna kashifatu durrihi aw aradani birahmatin hal hunna mum'sikatu rahmatihi qul hasbiya al-lahu alayhi yatawakkalu al-mutawakiluna
ayah_english: And if you ask them who created the heavens and the earth Surely, they will say Allah Say Then do you see what you invoke besides besides Allah if Allah intended for me Allah intended for me harm are they removers (of) harm (from) Him or if He intended for me mercy are they withholders (of) His mercy Say Sufficient (is) Allah for me Sufficient (is) Allah for me upon Him put trust those who trust

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلۡ أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلۡ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوۡ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحۡمَةٍ هَلۡ هُنَّ مُمۡسِكَٰتُ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ قُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُۖ عَلَيۡهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلۡ أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلۡ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوۡ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحۡمَةٍ هَلۡ هُنَّ مُمۡسِكَٰتُ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ قُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُۖ عَلَيۡهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلۡ أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلۡ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوۡ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحۡمَةٍ هَلۡ هُنَّ مُمۡسِكَٰتُ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ قُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُۖ عَلَيۡهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَٰمِلٞۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul yaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun fasawfa ta'lamuna
ayah_english: Say O my people! Work (according) to your position indeed I am working then soon you will know

ayah: مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ
ayah_translit: man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi wayahillu alayhi adhabun muqimun
ayah_english: (Upon) whom will come a punishment disgracing him and descends on him a punishment everlasting

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيۡهَاۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayah_translit: inna anzalna alayka al-kitaba lilnnasi bil-haqi famani ih'tada falinafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wama anta alayhim biwakilin
ayah_english: Indeed We We revealed to you the Book for [the] mankind in truth So whoever accepts guidance then (it is) for his soul and whoever goes astray then only he strays against his (soul) And not you (are) over them a manager

ayah_english: Indeed We We revealed to you the Book for [the] mankind in truth So whoever accepts guidance then (it is) for his soul and whoever goes astray then only he strays against his (soul) And not you (are) over them a manager

ayah: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلۡأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوۡتِهَا وَٱلَّتِي لَمۡ تَمُتۡ فِي مَنَامِهَاۖ فَيُمۡسِكُ ٱلَّتِي قَضَىٰ عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَيُرۡسِلُ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu yatawaffa al-anfusa hina mawtiha wa-allati lam tamut fi manamiha fayum'siku allati qada alayha al-mawta wayur'silu al-ukh'ra ila ajalin musamman inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: Allah takes the souls (at the) time (of) their death and the one who (does) not die in their sleep Then He keeps the one whom He has decreed for them the death and sends the others for a term specified Indeed in that surely (are) signs for a people who ponder

ayah_translit: al-lahu yatawaffa al-anfusa hina mawtiha wa-allati lam tamut fi manamiha fayum'siku allati qada alayha al-mawta wayur'silu al-ukh'ra ila ajalin musamman inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna

ayah: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: ami ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi shufa'aa qul awalaw kanu la yamlikuna shayan wala ya'qiluna
ayah_english: Or have they taken besides besides Allah intercessors Say Even though they were not possessing anything and not they understand

ayah: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah_english: Or have they taken besides besides Allah intercessors Say Even though they were not possessing anything and not they understand

ayah: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: qul lillahi al-shafa'atu jami'an lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi thumma ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Say To Allah (belongs) the intercession all For Him (is the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth Then to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُ ٱشۡمَأَزَّتۡ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha dhukira al-lahu wahdahu ish'ma-azzat qulubu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati wa-idha dhukira alladhina min dunihi idha hum yastabshiruna
ayah_english: And when Allah is mentioned Allah is mentioned Alone shrink with aversion (the) hearts (of) those who (do) not believe in the Hereafter and when are mentioned those besides Him besides Him behold They rejoice

ayah: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُ ٱشۡمَأَزَّتۡ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: quli al-lahuma fatira al-samawati wal-ardi alima al-ghaybi wal-shahadati anta tahkumu bayna ibadika fi ma kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: Say O Allah! Creator (of) the heavens and the earth Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed You will judge between Your slaves in what they used (to) therein differ

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَحۡتَسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw anna lilladhina zalamu ma fi al-ardi jami'an wamith'lahu ma'ahu la-if'tadaw bihi min sui al-'adhabi yawma al-qiyamati wabada lahum mina al-lahi ma lam yakunu yahtasibuna
ayah_english: And if And if those who did wrong (had) whatever (is) in the earth all and (the) like of it with it they would ransom with it from (the) evil (of) the punishment (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection And (will) appear to them from Allah what not they had taken into account

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَحۡتَسِبُونَ

ayah_english: And if And if those who did wrong (had) whatever (is) in the earth all and (the) like of it with it they would ransom with it from (the) evil (of) the punishment (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection And (will) appear to them from Allah what not they had taken into account

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَحۡتَسِبُونَ

ayah: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: wabada lahum sayyiatu ma kasabu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And will become apparent to them (the) evils (of) what they earned and will surround them what they used (to) [in it] mock

ayah: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلۡنَٰهُ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمِۭۚ بَلۡ هِيَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha massa al-insana durrun da'ana thumma idha khawwalnahu ni'matan minna qala innama utituhu ala il'min bal hiya fit'natun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So when touches [the] man adversity he calls upon Us then when We bestow (on) him a favor from Us he says Only I have been given it for knowledge Nay it (is) a trial but most of them (do) not know

ayah_english: So when touches [the] man adversity he calls upon Us then when We bestow (on) him a favor from Us he says Only I have been given it for knowledge Nay it (is) a trial but most of them (do) not know

ayah: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: qad qalaha alladhina min qablihim fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: Indeed said it those before them before them but (did) not avail them what they used (to) earn

ayah: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-asabahum sayyiatu ma kasabu wa-alladhina zalamu min haulai sayusibuhum sayyiatu ma kasabu wama hum bimu'jizina
ayah_english: Then struck them (the) evils (of) what they earned And those who have wronged of these will strike them (the) evils (of) what they earned and not they will be able to escape

ayah: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

ayah_english: Then struck them (the) evils (of) what they earned And those who have wronged of these will strike them (the) evils (of) what they earned and not they will be able to escape

ayah: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

ayah_english: Then struck them (the) evils (of) what they earned And those who have wronged of these will strike them (the) evils (of) what they earned and not they will be able to escape

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam ya'lamu anna al-laha yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: Do not they know that Allah extends the provision for whom He wills and restricts Indeed in that surely (are) signs for a people who believe

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah_english: Do not they know that Allah extends the provision for whom He wills and restricts Indeed in that surely (are) signs for a people who believe

ayah: ۞قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسۡرَفُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَا تَقۡنَطُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغۡفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: qul ya'ibadiya alladhina asrafu ala anfusihim la taqnatu min rahmati al-lahi inna al-laha yaghfiru al-dhunuba jami'an innahu huwa al-ghafuru al-rahimu
ayah_english: Say O My slaves! Those who have transgressed against themselves (do) not despair of (the) Mercy (of) Allah Indeed Allah forgives the sins all Indeed He He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: ۞قُلۡ يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسۡرَفُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَا تَقۡنَطُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغۡفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ayah: وَأَنِيبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُواْ لَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-anibu ila rabbikum wa-aslimu lahu min qabli an yatiyakumu al-'adhabu thumma la tunsaruna
ayah_english: And turn to your Lord and submit to Him before before [that] comes to you the punishment then not you will be helped

ayah: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓاْ أَحۡسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ittabi'u ahsana ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum min qabli an yatiyakumu al-'adhabu baghtatan wa-antum la tash'uruna
ayah_english: And follow (the) best (of) what is revealed to you from your Lord before before [that] comes to you the punishment suddenly while you (do) not perceive

ayah: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓاْ أَحۡسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah: أَن تَقُولَ نَفۡسٞ يَٰحَسۡرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِي جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
ayah_translit: an taqula nafsun yahasrata ala ma farrattu fi janbi al-lahi wa-in kuntu lamina al-sakhirina
ayah_english: Lest should say a soul Oh! My regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was surely among the mockers

ayah: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: aw taqula law anna al-laha hadani lakuntu mina al-mutaqina
ayah_english: Or it should say If only If only Allah (had) guided me surely, I (would) have been among the righteous

ayah: أَوۡ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلۡعَذَابَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي كَرَّةٗ فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: aw taqula hina tara al-'adhaba law anna li karratan fa-akuna mina al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: Or it should say when it sees the punishment If only I had another chance then I could be among the good-doers

ayah: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: bala qad jaatka ayati fakadhabta biha wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kafirina
ayah_english: Nay verily came to you My Verses but you denied them and were arrogant and you were among the disbelievers

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسۡوَدَّةٌۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayah_translit: wayawma al-qiyamati tara alladhina kadhabu ala al-lahi wujuhuhum mus'waddatun alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'mutakabbirina
ayah_english: And (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah their faces (will be) blackened Is (there) not in Hell an abode for the arrogant

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسۡوَدَّةٌۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

ayah: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
ayah_translit: wayunajji al-lahu alladhina ittaqaw bimafazatihim la yamassuhumu al-suu wala hum yahzanuna
ayah_english: And Allah will deliver And Allah will deliver those who feared (Him) to their place of salvation not will touch them the evil and not they will grieve

ayah: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
ayah_translit: wayunajji al-lahu alladhina ittaqaw bimafazatihim la yamassuhumu al-suu wala hum yahzanuna

ayah: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ
ayah_translit: al-lahu khaliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ala kulli shayin wakilun
ayah_english: Allah (is the) Creator (of) all things and He (is) over all things a Guardian

ayah: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ

ayah: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: lahu maqalidu al-samawati wal-ardi wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: For Him (are the) keys (of) the heavens and the earth And those who disbelieve in (the) Verses (of) Allah those they (are) the losers

ayah: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurunni a'budu ayyuha al-jahiluna
ayah_english: Say Is (it) other than Allah you order me (to) worship O ignorant ones

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ لَئِنۡ أَشۡرَكۡتَ لَيَحۡبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad uhiya ilayka wa-ila alladhina min qablika la-in ashrakta layahbatanna amaluka walatakunanna mina al-khasirina
ayah_english: And verily it has been revealed to you and to those who (were) before you (were) before you if you associate (with Allah) surely, will become worthless your deeds and you will surely be among the losers

ayah_english: And verily it has been revealed to you and to those who (were) before you (were) before you if you associate (with Allah) surely, will become worthless your deeds and you will surely be among the losers

ayah: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayah_translit: bali al-laha fa-u'bud wakun mina al-shakirina
ayah_english: Nay But worship Allah But worship Allah and be among the thankful ones

ayah_translit: bali al-laha fa-u'bud wakun mina al-shakirina
ayah_english: Nay But worship Allah But worship Allah and be among the thankful ones

ayah: وَمَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ جَمِيعٗا قَبۡضَتُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطۡوِيَّـٰتُۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: wama qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi wal-ardu jami'an qabdatuhu yawma al-qiyamati wal-samawatu matwiyyatun biyaminihi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And not they appraised Allah (with) true appraisal while the earth entirely (will be) in His Grip (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection and the heavens (will be) folded in His Right Hand Glory be to Him! And High is He above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: وَمَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ جَمِيعٗا قَبۡضَتُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطۡوِيَّـٰتُۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah_translit: wama qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi wal-ardu jami'an qabdatuhu yawma al-qiyamati wal-samawatu matwiyyatun biyaminihi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And not they appraised Allah (with) true appraisal while the earth entirely (will be) in His Grip (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection and the heavens (will be) folded in His Right Hand Glory be to Him! And High is He above what they associate (with Him)

ayah_english: And not they appraised Allah (with) true appraisal while the earth entirely (will be) in His Grip (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection and the heavens (will be) folded in His Right Hand Glory be to Him! And High is He above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخۡرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمۡ قِيَامٞ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wanufikha fi al-suri fasa'iqa man fi al-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu thumma nufikha fihi ukh'ra fa-idha hum qiyamun yanzuruna
ayah_english: And (will) be blown [in] the trumpet then (will) fall dead whoever (is) in the heavens and whoever (is) on the earth except whom Allah wills Allah wills Then (it will) be blown [in it] a second time and behold They (will be) standing waiting

ayah_translit: wanufikha fi al-suri fasa'iqa man fi al-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu thumma nufikha fihi ukh'ra fa-idha hum qiyamun yanzuruna
ayah_english: And (will) be blown [in] the trumpet then (will) fall dead whoever (is) in the heavens and whoever (is) on the earth except whom Allah wills Allah wills Then (it will) be blown [in it] a second time and behold They (will be) standing waiting

ayah: وَأَشۡرَقَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ وَجِاْيٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ashraqati al-ardu binuri rabbiha wawudi'a al-kitabu wajia bil-nabiyina wal-shuhadai waqudiya baynahum bil-haqi wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And (will) shine the earth with (the) light (of) its Lord and (will) be placed the Record and (will) be brought the Prophets and the witnesses and it (will) be judged between them in truth and they will not be wronged will not be wronged

ayah: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin ma amilat wahuwa a'lamu bima yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: And (will) be paid in full every soul what it did and He (is the) Best-Knower of what they do

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَاۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wasiqa alladhina kafaru ila jahannama zumaran hatta idha jauha futihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha alam yatikum rusulun minkum yatluna alaykum ayati rabbikum wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu bala walakin haqqat kalimatu al-'adhabi ala al-kafirina
ayah_english: And (will) be driven those who disbelieve to Hell (in) groups until when they reach it (will) be opened its gates and (will) say to them its keepers Did not come to you Messengers from you reciting to you (the) Verses (of) your Lord and warning you (of the) meeting (of) your Day this They (will) say Nay! But has been justified (the) word (of) punishment against the disbelievers

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَاۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَاۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wasiqa alladhina kafaru ila jahannama zumaran hatta idha jauha futihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha alam yatikum rusulun minkum yatluna alaykum ayati rabbikum wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu bala walakin haqqat kalimatu al-'adhabi ala al-kafirina

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَاۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wasiqa alladhina kafaru ila jahannama zumaran hatta idha jauha futihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha alam yatikum rusulun minkum yatluna alaykum ayati rabbikum wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu bala walakin haqqat kalimatu al-'adhabi ala al-kafirina

ayah: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayah_translit: qila ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha fabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
ayah_english: It will be said Enter (the) gates (of) Hell (to) abide eternally therein and wretched is (the) abode (of) the arrogant

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَنَّةِ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ طِبۡتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُوهَا خَٰلِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wasiqa alladhina ittaqaw rabbahum ila al-janati zumaran hatta idha jauha wafutihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha salamun alaykum tib'tum fa-ud'khuluha khalidina
ayah_english: And (will) be driven those who feared their Lord to Paradise (in) groups until when they reach it and (will) be opened its gates and (will) say to them its keepers Peace be upon you you have done well so enter it (to) abide eternally

ayah: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَنَّةِ زُمَرًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ طِبۡتُمۡ فَٱدۡخُلُوهَا خَٰلِدِينَ

ayah: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي صَدَقَنَا وَعۡدَهُۥ وَأَوۡرَثَنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ حَيۡثُ نَشَآءُۖ فَنِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ
ayah_translit: waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi sadaqana wa'dahu wa-awrathana al-arda natabawwa-u mina al-janati haythu nashau fani'ma ajru al-'amilina
ayah_english: And they will say All praise (be) to Allah Who has fulfilled for us His promise and has made us inherit the earth we may settle in Paradise wherever we will So excellent is (the) reward (of) the workers

ayah: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي صَدَقَنَا وَعۡدَهُۥ وَأَوۡرَثَنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ حَيۡثُ نَشَآءُۖ فَنِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ

ayah_translit: waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi sadaqana wa'dahu wa-awrathana al-arda natabawwa-u mina al-janati haythu nashau fani'ma ajru al-'amilina

ayah_english: And they will say All praise (be) to Allah Who has fulfilled for us His promise and has made us inherit the earth we may settle in Paradise wherever we will So excellent is (the) reward (of) the workers

ayah: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَقِيلَ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: watara al-malaikata haffina min hawli al-'arshi yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim waqudiya baynahum bil-haqi waqila al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: And you will see the Angels surrounding [from] around the Throne glorifying (the) praise (of) their Lord And (will) be judged between them in truth and it will be said All praise be to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah_english: And you will see the Angels surrounding [from] around the Throne glorifying (the) praise (of) their Lord And (will) be judged between them in truth and it will be said All praise be to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَقِيلَ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: watara al-malaikata haffina min hawli al-'arshi yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim waqudiya baynahum bil-haqi waqila al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: And you will see the Angels surrounding [from] around the Throne glorifying (the) praise (of) their Lord And (will) be judged between them in truth and it will be said All praise be to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَقِيلَ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_english: And you will see the Angels surrounding [from] around the Throne glorifying (the) praise (of) their Lord And (will) be judged between them in truth and it will be said All praise be to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds
